function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Accumulation of pathogenic particles on ioniser and surrounding surfaces due to negative air ionisation","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases and infections","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough cleanings, use of alternative air purification methods","Technologies":"UVGI disinfection, air filtration systems","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of assessment and comparison of infection risk associated with lighting factors that reflect sunlight exposure","Impact":"Limited understanding of the impact of lighting on infectious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Conducting studies to assess and compare infection risk, implementing appropriate lighting measures","Technologies":"Sunlight simulation studies, epidemiological analysis","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Insufficient assessment of the effectiveness of UVGI systems in mitigating the spread of contagious diseases in healthcare settings","Impact":"Inadequate preparedness for disease outbreaks and pandemics, increased risk of healthcare-associated infections","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive assessments of UVGI effectiveness, implementing additional infection control measures","Technologies":"UVGI systems, infection control protocols","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, infection control teams"}]}
